OrgName: General Motors Holdings LLC, its subsidiaries and affiliates, excluding General Motors Financial Company, Inc.: customer data
activities:
Information about identified or identifiable users of the products and services of GM controlled subsidiaries and affiliates in Europe (collectively, "GM Europe companies") for which GM and its controlled subsidiaires and affiliates in the United States ("GM U.S.") act as a data processor by providing data hosting, maintenance, support and troubleshooting of services, as well as other redundant back office support.

Information about identified or identifiable users of OnStar Europe Ltd.'s products and services (collectively referred to as "OnStar Europe Customer Data"), for which GM U.S. acts as a data processor for OnStar Europe Ltd. by providing maintenance, support and troubleshooting of services, as well as other redundant back office support.

GM Europe companies and OnStar Europe Ltd. act as controllers of their own European cusomter data and GM U.S. acts as a data processor for these companies.

This certificaiton includes data collected online or offline either directly or indirectly.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: European Customer Data as defined in Description of Activities above.
recoursemech: International Centre for Dispute resolution, the international division of the American Arbitration Association (IDCR/AAA)at the following website: http://go.adr.org/safeharbor
